phrases: Let us move!
Hange?
G-Get me a horse.
Section Commander!
Where are you trying to go?
To that village where we captured the Titan who could not walk.
You mean Ragako?
I need to see it... with my own eyes.
Do not say something so ridiculous!
Your body cannot take riding a horse right now!
I have a hunch... that we need to investigate...
All right.
I will go there on my own, so you just stay here and faint or something.
Spread out!
Take formation to locate any enemies!
Eren...
Opening
Oh, Eren?
You are awake?
What the hell?!
My arms!
Eren.
Look at me.
I am in the same shape as you.
Guess the both of us are having a bad day.
Ymir...
Why... do not I have any arms?
That is my bad.
I am the one who did that.
I kind of was in a hurry.
When I rushed to bite your nape, I neglected to take your arms into account.
I see...
Eren, stop!
Hold your horses, Eren.
Take a good look around us.
We are in the giant forest within Wall Maria.
It is not even close to any of the walls.
In other words, we are deep in Titan territory.
Take a look.
I think that one down there is an Abnormal.
It looks like he is just lounging around, but he is not taking his eyes off us.
There is a lot of small ones down there, too.
That alone is dangerous.
Over that way's another big one.
He staring at us, but will not come any closer.
I bet you that one's a scaredy-cat.
And then you have got these chumps.
Those dirty bastards.
They are the only ones with any ODM gear on.
Reiner's wearing gear he took from you.
So I do not think changing into a Titan at this point is going to solve anything.
Not only can they do that, but they can escape high into the trees as well.
Those two aside, there is Titans all around us.
Escaping out of this Titan territory would be tough, even with Titan powers.
Understand?
There is nothing to gain by acting up.
No.
You two cannot even turn into Titans right now.
So do not count on that to help you.
Your body is at its limit.
It is taking everything you have got to repair the damage.
Are you stupid?
Why the hell would I trust anything coming out of your mouth?
Well...
It is not like I know the specifics behind how Titan powers work.
Unlike you guys, I am pretty clueless about it.
Hey, Reiner.
You said you would talk once Eren woke up.
It is about time one of you says what you plan to do with us.
We will take you to our hometown.
I realize that you are not going to listen and do as I say.
But like Ymir was saying, this place is swarming with Titans.
We could beat the shit out of each other right now,
but when we are weak, the other Titans would just come and eat us.
So until nightfall, when the Titans cannot move, we have no choice but to wait here.
Whether you try to run and escape from us...
Why did not you stay the Armored Titan and run home?
What is the point of stopping here?
Too tired and had to take a break?
Why do not you use your imagination?
Let us think...
If I waited for an opening and became a Titan,
running away from here does not seem like it would pose a challenge.
But will I be able to transform into a Titan in the first place?
Reiner said that I cannot...
And I have to consider that even Reiner had to stop here to take a break.
If my Titan form is not strong enough,
does that mean I will just get eaten by the others?
Are you simply waiting here for it to become night?
Maybe I am.
No...
There is no way they would wait until nightfall.
They are not going to give our bodies the chance to fully recover.
They will make their move while we are still powerless.
At this rate, I cannot do anything.
At this rate...
What happened to everybody?
Where are the Scouts?
Do not tell me they are coming this way...
If they try to help, no one's going to make it back safely.
What is it matter?
Those Titans at the castle moved just fine at night.
Will not these Titans, too?
The Titans here cannot move at night.
You should know all about it, Ymir.
Speaking of which, why can Ymir turn into a Titan?
I do not think she is like me, who knew nothing about it.
Is she on our side?
I do not even know what her goal is yet.
She is hard enough to understand as it is.
I have made up my mind.
Right now, what I need is information.
I need to figure out everything I can from these guys.
And then I will make my escape.
To do that, I need...
Information Available for Public Disclosure
Titan Regeneration
Those with the power to become Titans possess an inherent ability to regenerate.
Their limbs can be dismembered and their internal organs destroyed, but as long as they survive, their bodies will regenerate back to normal given sufficient time.
Titan spotted at three'o clock!
Fire the smoke!
Smoke she will confirmed on the right wing!
Do not change direction!
Have the right wing merge with the center and hold course!
We only have until sunset!
We must take the shortest possible path!
Mikasa.
Hey, Mikasa!
Mikasa!
Stop pushing so hard.
You are drifting near the vanguard.
It will ruin the whole formation.
I know how you feel, but... did not I tell you?
Eren will not get taken away without putting up a fight.
Do not you agree?
You know he will never give up.
So it is up to us to stay calm and be there when he needs us.
Just like we did back then.
Reiner.
You got any water?
If I do not get some soon, I am going to dry up and die.
Even if it is a matter of life and death,
there is nothing we can do given our situation.
He is completely right...
This situation could not be any shittier.
Speaking of which...
Ever since the Titans showed up yesterday morning,
we have been working our asses off.
With nothing to eat or drink and not even a wink of sleep.
Fortunately, the wall was not broken or anything.
So I think we deserve to take a break for once.
We will see about getting promoted later.
Reiner...
What?
We have done plenty enough to deserve it.
I think we have performed outstandingly, considering all we have been put through.
I know soldiers like us are expected to fulfill their duties, but...
I think we have all earned it.
Reiner...
What in the world are you talking about?
Huh?
What do you mean?
I am not saying we go demand to be promoted to captains or anything.
That is... not what I mean.
Oh, yeah.
Where did you all get that cannon from?
That really saved my ass.
It is a good thing Christa helped me after that.
To be honest, I think she has a thing for me.
Hey...
Now that I think about it, Christa has always treated me especially-
Hey!
You bastard...
You have got to be kidding me.
Huh?
What are you so angry about, Eren?
Did I... say something wrong?
If you want to die, just keep talking!
Hold up, Eren.
This is not normal, no matter how you look at it.
Is not that right, Bertholdt?
If you know something, quit with the silence and come out and say it.
Huh?
Reiner...
You are not... a soldier, remember?
You and I...
Reiner!
What are you doing?!
Hey...
Why...
Right.
That is... how it is.
Huh?
What is he doing?
More or less, I think I have figured it out.
I thought it was strange.
Why would the guy who broke the wall risk his life to save Conny?
Everything he does is contradictory, but he does not realize it himself.
I do not know why he ended up like this, but probably...
He was originally a warrior whose goal was to break the wall, but...
he lost sight of who he was and could not tell which one was real.
No...
Unable to bear the weight of his sins, he convinced
himself he was a soldier protecting the wall
to maintain emotional balance within his own heart.
And in the end, he believed it.
As a result, his heart was split and his memories broken.
This must not be the first time Reiner's talked and made no sense...
It is amazing, really.
For someone excessively honest like you to-
Enough!
Shut your mouth.
Sorry about that.
I might have pried too much.
You have got to be kidding me.
Why are you pretending to be the victim here?
What is your deal?
That day, what the hell were you thinking when you talked to us?
Tell me, Bertholdt.
I am talking to you, you damn lackey.
I told you everything... while you looked at me right in the eyes.
About the day my mother was eaten alive...
Stop!
Is not that right?
Thanks to the piece of wall you kicked that went flying straight into my house,
my mother could not escape or run away.
You remember, right?
I told you my story.
What were you thinking?
What were you thinking when I told you?
Back then...
Oh...
I see...
You guys...
You guys...
You are just murderers.
You are psychotic mass-murderers
who have killed countless innocent people who never did anything wrong!
You do not think I know that?!
I do not need you to point that out to me!
Then do not pretend to have emotions like you are one of us!
You guys are not even human anymore!
It is you two who have turned this world into a living hell!
Does that make you happy, murderers?!
What are you after by calling us murderers?!
Do you want us to regret it?
Do you want us to apologize?!
Would that give you satisfaction?
The people you thought we were no longer exist!
If screaming will make you feel better, then scream your damn head off!
That is right...
I am still...
I have...
Do what I can...
You have got it coming.
You cannot be serious.
Huh?
Quit it, Eren.
If you keep saying childish crap like that, I have got no hope for you.
Huh?!
Hey, Reiner.
What is the deal with that monkey?
Monkey?
What do you mean?
Hmm?
You do not know?
That is surprising, given how much you two
stared at it with stars in your eyes like two little brats.
That monkey...
What is that?
A monkey?
Just listen.
That monkey Beast Titan is what caused this recent fiasco.
It made Titans rise up from within the wall.
I wonder if he was trying to assess our strength.
That is where these guys are trying to get.
If you guys get to him, you will be able to go back home, right?
You... knew this?
What do you know?!
Tell me everything!
Just wait.
I have got circumstances of my own.
What the hell do you mean by that?!
Eren... if you think killing these two will bring an end to everything...
Huh?!
Then who is the enemy?!
Enemy?
If I said that, the-
Ymir!
Do you think there is any future for this world?
If you know so much, think about what you want to do.
It is not out of the question for you to join our side.
And trust you?
Yeah, right.
You two do not even trust me.
Wrong.
We can trust you.
Because your one goal...
When it comes to her, we should be able to trust one another.
You might think that I am joking, but...
Is it that hard for you to believe that
we might want the best for Christa as well?
Or... would you rather put your hopes in Eren and rely on him over us?
Huh?!
You are probably thinking your best chance is to use Eren to escape from here.
Because if you are taken by us, there is little chance for your rescue.
To be honest, that is pretty much true.
Even if you come with us, we cannot guarantee your safety.
But if it is Christa we are talking about, we might be able to do something for her.
Will it be your petty life... or Christa's future?
It is up to you to decide.
There is no future for this world?
Why is that?
What is this about a monkey?
What is going on?
Hey!
Hey, say something!
Who is the enemy?!
Ymir!
Who knows...
It is settled then.
Too bad, Eren.
The Scouts... are already...
Dammit!
Shit!
Damn you, Ymir.
There is just one hour left until sunset.
As sunset swiftly approaches...
The pair plot to make their escape, fleeing by use of ODM gear.
However, reflecting on her past and emotions, Ymir offers a plan of her own.
Children
Next episode: Children.
